selections.name: City Exile (gb)
selections.reason: Top class runner (Class 108) with consistent 100+ speed figures. 9/5 Morning Line favorite for a reason; drops slightly in class context and maintains strong form.

selections.name: Time Song
selections.reason: Possesses elite speed (115) and gets the rail. The Smith/Thomas combination is dangerous, and the horse has back class to challenge the favorite.

selections.name: Mr. Leasure
selections.reason: Consistent runner with a 116 speed figure on the resume. Should sit a good trip just off the pace.

selections.name: Sketchy
selections.reason: Has shown flashes of brilliance with a 118 speed figure. If he runs to that number, he is a major player.

danger_horse.name: Time Song
danger_horse.reason: Speed figure of 115 is competitive with the top pick, and rail draw saves ground.

selections.name: Wolf Hill
selections.reason: Highest speed figure (109) and class (110) in the field. Ran a strong 2nd in debut and looks poised to break maiden here.

selections.name: Luckiest
selections.reason: Baffert trainee who ran a solid 2nd in debut with a 105 speed figure. Likely to improve second time out.

selections.name: Banzai Betty
selections.reason: Consistent performer with a 103 speed figure. Should be in the mix for minor awards.

selections.name: Forced Entry
selections.reason: Another Baffert runner with a 105 speed figure. Cannot be ignored given connections.

danger_horse.name: Luckiest
danger_horse.reason: Baffert second-time starter with high speed figures is always a threat.

selections.name: B Grayson
selections.reason: Strong recent form with a 105 speed figure. 8/5 Morning Line suggests he is the one to beat.

selections.name: Bazooka Charlie
selections.reason: Matches the top pick with a 105 speed figure. Should be right there at the finish.

selections.name: Maximus
selections.reason: Speed figure of 104 puts him in contention. 5/1 odds offer some value underneath.

selections.name: Everydayissaturday
selections.reason: Has the highest back speed (109) but form is inconsistent. Dangerous if he wakes up.

danger_horse.name: Bazooka Charlie
danger_horse.reason: Very evenly matched with the top pick on speed figures.

selections.name: Joker Went Wild
selections.reason: Clear standout with 101 speed figure and 102 class rating. 3/2 ML is justified.

selections.name: Lake Smokin
selections.reason: Solid 99 speed figure makes him the clear second choice. Should chase the favorite home.

selections.name: Kiki Ride
selections.reason: Speed figure of 97 puts him in the mix for the exotics.

selections.name: Tiggrrr Whitworth
selections.reason: Competitive 96 speed figure. Can fill out the superfecta.

selections.name: Surfin' U. S. A.
selections.reason: Value Play. Speed figure of 109 is significantly higher than the field. At 8/1, this is a massive overlay.

selections.name: Kizazi
selections.reason: Consistent runner with a 102 speed figure. Solid alternative if the top pick falters.

selections.name: Red Cherry
selections.reason: Speed figure of 100 is competitive. Inside draw helps.

selections.name: Silkie Sevei (ire)
selections.reason: Morning line favorite (5/2) but speed figure (90) is lower than top contenders. Vulnerable favorite.

danger_horse.name: Silkie Sevei (ire)
danger_horse.reason: D'Amato/Jaramillo connections command respect despite lower figures.

selections.name: The Big Cheeseola
selections.reason: Speed figure of 108 and 5/2 odds. Looks best in a field depleted by scratches.

selections.name: Windribbon
selections.reason: Classy runner with a 109 speed figure. 3/1 ML makes him a prime contender.

selections.name: Oobubbakakayo
selections.reason: Highest speed figure in the race (110). 6/1 offers value.

selections.name: Carol's Comic
selections.reason: Consistent 107 speed figure. Good for vertical wagers.

danger_horse.name: Windribbon
danger_horse.reason: Proven back class and high speed figures make him a serious threat.

selections.name: Darlin Sugaree
selections.reason: Form horse with a 99 speed figure. 3/2 ML reflects her strong chance.

selections.name: Final Table Lady
selections.reason: Solid 97 speed figure and 3/1 odds. Logical second choice.

selections.name: Donde Esta Jefe
selections.reason: Has hit a 100 speed figure recently. 8/1 is good value for a horse with that ceiling.

selections.name: Tiger Lady
selections.reason: Speed figure of 98 puts her right in the mix.

danger_horse.name: Donde Esta Jefe
danger_horse.reason: Speed figure of 100 is the highest in the field; dangerous if she runs to that number.

selections.name: Miss Practical
selections.reason: Strong 110 speed figure and 114 class rating. 3/1 ML. Outside post is favorable.

selections.name: Lavender Love
selections.reason: Highest speed figure in the race (113). 8/1 ML is a huge overlay.

selections.name: Stay In Line
selections.reason: Speed figure of 108 is very competitive. 6/1 odds.

selections.name: Rizzleberry Rose
selections.reason: Speed figure of 103. Wide draw but has speed.

danger_horse.name: Lavender Love
danger_horse.reason: Speed figure of 113 is elite for this level. Must be included.
